item.title: Exploring Oci Registries By Use Case
item.description: Imagine an organisation has 6 application teams. Each team has their own Kubernetes cluster so they can operate independently on their own cadence. Each cluster has access to pull images from the public internet.

item.title: Exploring OCI Registries: Chapter 2: Pull a Public Helm Chart
item.description: Aisha’s a Platform Engineer. As a platform engineer, every day, Aisha upgrades and rolls back helm charts. That’s an natural evolution from the time honoured IT tradition of turning it off and on again!

item.title: Exploring OCI Container Registries: Chapter 1: Pull a Public Image from Kubernetes
item.description: Let’s begin with one of the most common use cases of a Container Registry: Pull A Public Container Image Here’s a simple kubernetes cluster. It has access to pull images from the public internet.
